definition: Portugal/Portuguese/abbr. for 葡萄牙[Pu2 tao2 ya2]

pinyin: pu2 tao2 qiu2 jun1 chang2 du2 su4

sentences.english: Deep skin infections were associated with staphylococcal meningitis in infancy.
sentences.chinese: 深部的皮膚感染在嬰兒期易並有葡萄球菌腦膜炎。

sentences.english: Conclusion The Yutian Kechuan capsule has certain of antibacterial effects on staphylococcus aureus.
sentences.chinese: 結論蝓天克喘膠囊對金黃色葡萄球菌有一定抗菌作用。

sentences.english: Staphylococcus and enterococcus resistant to vancomycin were not found.
sentences.chinese: 尚未發現耐萬古黴素的葡萄球菌株及腸球菌株。

sentences.english: The objective of this experiment was to extracted and purified capsular polysaccharide from Staphylococcus aureus, and detected its contents.
sentences.chinese: 爲提取純化金黃色葡萄球菌莢膜多糖並測定多糖含量。

sentences.english: Streprococci and staphylocci are responsible for a wide variety of infections.
sentences.chinese: 鏈球菌和葡萄球菌是引起各種感染的原因。

sentences.english: Last, we used Staphylococcus aureus and Escherichia coli for the experiment of biological activities.
sentences.chinese: 並且利用金黃色葡萄球菌與大腸菌來做滅菌率的測試。

sentences.english: Said preparation comprises bacteria - killing effective quantity of lysostaphin and lysozyme .
sentences.chinese: 該製劑包括殺菌有效量的溶葡萄球菌酶和溶菌酶。

sentences.english: Objective To study the resistance of methicillin-resistant staphylococci against antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究耐甲氧西林葡萄球菌的耐藥狀況。

sentences.english: By 1928, Fleming was investigating the properties of staphylococci .
sentences.chinese: 1928年的時候，弗萊明正在分析葡萄球菌的特性。

sentences.english: By isolating and identifying the sample, a strain of S. human was separated.
sentences.chinese: 經對送檢病料的分離與鑑定，分離出一株人葡萄球菌。

sentences.english: Please discuss the clinical manifestations of the staphylococcal aureus pneumonia in children.
sentences.chinese: 試述小兒金黃色葡萄球菌肺炎的臨牀表現。

sentences.english: Furunculosis is usually due to Staphylococcus aureus.
sentences.chinese: 癤病常常由金黃色葡萄球菌所引起。

sentences.english: Staphylococcus aureus and Pseudomonas aeruginosa can be tested when general method were used.
sentences.chinese: 金黃色葡萄球菌和銅綠假單胞菌可採用常規法檢驗。

sentences.english: For Gram-positive bacteria and penicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus infection.
sentences.chinese: 用於革蘭氏陽性菌及耐青黴素葡萄球菌的感染。

sentences.english: Drug-resistant staph really exploded in healthcare.
sentences.chinese: 抗藥性葡萄球菌已經在醫療系統爆發。

sentences.english: An increased consumption of AHR was associated with a significant reduction of MRSA rates.
sentences.chinese: 一個障礙物增加消費相關的和葡萄球菌則顯着減少。

definition: gonococcus/Neisseria gonorrhoeae, the pathogen causing gonorrhea
Gram negative (bacteria that do not retain Gram stain, often the more dangerous kind)
